title: Banco Santander global operations : geographic diversification of profit 2019
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of attributable profit in each Region on the y axis.
The maximum Share of attributable profit 47.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at North America where Region is 16.0.
The difference of Share of attributable profit between the highest and lowest Region is 31.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of attributable profit for 3 number of Regions.
The Share of attributable profit is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region North America.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Share of attributable profit in each Region on the y axis.
The maximum Share of attributable profit 47.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at North America where Region is 16.0.
The difference of Share of attributable profit between the highest and lowest Region is 31.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Region in the x axis and Share of attributable profit in the y axis.
The maximum Share of attributable profit 47.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at North America where Region is 16.0.
Second maximum Share of attributable profit is found at Region South America.
The lowest value at Region North America is 2.94x times less than the highest value at Europe.
The average Share of attributable profit in all 3 Regions is 33.33.
The Share of attributable profit is 100.0 if we add up values of all Regions.
